name: Checkmate (Charlie Morel)
description:
- Checkmate -

All of your fellow pawns are dead... Now, you're the only one who can protect your king and kill the opposite one !

Checkmate is a TPS game where you have to escort / move your king to protect him and destroy the enemy pawns who tries to kill him !

This game was created for the Ludum Dare Jam 46, based on the theme "Keep it alive". (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/checkmate)

Controls:

Move = WASD
Jump = Spacebar
Shoot = Mouse left-click
Aim = Mouse right-click
E = Move the King
R = Reload

Game Designers:

-Mathis Bressaud
-Paul Lyaudet
-Charlie Morel
